translation.welcome_description: Enter a nickname to register on the leaderboard.
translation.no_ranking_data: No ranking data. Press 'Save' to join!
translation.game_saved_desc: Your progress has been saved locally and to the leaderboard.
translation.reset_confirm: ⚠️ Are you sure you want to reset all progress? This cannot be undone.
translation.message3: The coffee shop next door is watching you, {{name}}.
translation.message6: Rank 1 is just around the corner, {{name}}!
translation.message7: It's not a bug, it's your skill, {{name}}.
translation.item_0_desc: An Italian household essential! It extracts rich espresso with steam pressure. A small but great first step to excellent coffee.
translation.item_1_desc: Essential for hygiene and safety! Protects your precious hands from hot water and detergent, speeding up dishwashing.
translation.item_2_desc: The dream of a home cafe. Brews coffee easily with one button. Capsule costs are a bit high, but the efficiency is certain.
translation.item_3_desc: A primitive tool for when the grinder breaks. It relieves stress and grinds beans with every strike.
translation.item_4_desc: A professional espresso machine used in cafes. It continuously extracts golden crema with powerful pressure.
translation.item_5_desc: Analog sentiment of roasting beans over an open flame. Your arm might hurt, but you find the best roasting point with an artisan's touch.
translation.item_6_desc: You opened a coffee chain found in every neighborhood. Part-timers sell coffee for you, so you just need to count the money.
translation.item_7_desc: Obtained the highest difficulty certification. From latte art to hand drip, art is born from your fingertips.
translation.item_8_desc: A large coffee factory with all processes automated. Robot arms roast and package beans 24/7.
translation.item_9_desc: A power glove packed with the latest technology. Microcurrents stimulate muscles to dramatically increase click speed.
translation.item_10_desc: A huge ship that sails the five oceans, carrying the finest green beans. Each container is full of money.
translation.item_11_desc: A mechanical arm was implanted to surpass human limits. Infinite clicking is possible with tireless stamina.
translation.item_12_desc: The heart of the coffee empire that sways the world economy. You watch sales from the top of a skyscraper.
translation.item_13_desc: A hand with mutated genes due to excessive caffeine exposure. You might not have 10 fingers... but the click efficiency is monstrous.
translation.item_14_desc: A barista AI legion to replace humanity. They mass-produce perfect coffee with flawless recipes. Skynet... no, StarbucksNet?
translation.item_15_desc: Roast beans with mental power, transcending the physical body. A state where roasting happens as you think it.
translation.item_16_desc: Hacked a weather satellite to bring optimal rain to coffee farms worldwide. Forcing a bountiful harvest.
translation.item_17_desc: The heat of the Earth's core, magma, is in your fingertips. Beans are instantly dark-roasted upon contact.
translation.item_18_desc: Using the far side of the moon as a coffee drying yard. The weak gravity makes the beans lighter and more fragrant.
translation.item_19_desc: Pulling asteroids from space to strike the beans. Shelling them with destructive force.
translation.item_20_desc: Boiling water with the energy of an artificial sun. The heat can extract an ocean of coffee in a second.
translation.item_21_desc: A fist containing the explosive power of the sun's surface. A single click shakes the solar system.
translation.item_22_desc: Throwing beans beyond the event horizon to grind them at a molecular level. The most perfect particles can be obtained.
translation.item_23_desc: Clicking across dimensions. Folding spacetime to amplify the number of clicks to infinity.
translation.item_24_desc: Roasting using the explosive power of the universe's birth. This cup of coffee contains the history of the cosmos.
translation.item_25_desc: The divine power to directly modify the game's data. You can create as much coffee as you want.
translation.item_26_desc: Turning back time to deliver coffee before it gets cold. All orders are completed in 0 seconds.
translation.item_27_desc: Reversing entropy to refill already drunk coffee. The true meaning of infinite refills.
translation.item_28_desc: Opened chains on every other Earth in parallel universes. Profits pour in from infinite universes.
translation.item_29_desc: Summoning yourself from another dimension to work for you. I rest, the doppelgänger clicks.
translation.item_30_desc: Embodying the perfect form of coffee Plato spoke of. Its mere existence awakens the universe.
translation.item_31_desc: A pile of beans that never depletes no matter how much you scoop. A spoonful that defies the laws of physics.
translation.item_32_desc: The authority to directly modify the code of this world. `beans = Infinity`.
translation.item_33_desc: The one who has achieved all achievements and stands at the pinnacle. Your every gesture is law.
translation.item_34_desc: Grinding planets instead of coffee beans. The entire galaxy is your caffeine supply.
translation.item_35_desc: Gathering the energy of the cosmos to touch. Big Bang-level energy is generated.
translation.item_36_desc: Becoming the flow of time itself to produce coffee. It never stops, forever.
translation.item_37_desc: Creating a new universe. And that universe is filled with coffee.
